Works.Description: During my internship at Tebar Digital Kreasi from February to May 2023, I delved into the realm of web development as a Web Programmer intern. Collaborating closely with seasoned developers, I honed my skills in PHP, Javascript, Laravel, and React JS while contributing to real-world projects. From crafting interactive user interfaces to optimizing website performance, the experience provided invaluable insights into agile development methodologies and emphasized the significance of teamwork in achieving project objectives. This internship not only solidified my understanding of web programming concepts but also paved the way for my future endeavors as a proficient web developer.

During my internship at Timewebid from August 1st to October 1st, 2023, I actively engaged as a Web Programmer, contributing to various projects and gaining hands-on experience in web development. I collaborated with the team to develop and maintain web applications, implementing innovative solutions and adhering to industry best practices. Through this internship, I honed my skills in Laravel, API, Vue JS, Quasar, and learned to work efficiently within a professional environment, further solidifying my passion for web development.

Since November 1st, 2023, I have been serving as a part-time Web Developer at Timewebid, where I continue to apply my expertise in web development while balancing academic commitments. In this role, I contribute to the development and enhancement of web applications, collaborating with the team to deliver high-quality solutions that meet client requirements. Working part-time has allowed me to deepen my understanding of web technologies, refine my coding skills, and gain valuable real-world experience in the dynamic field of web development.

Since January 1st, 2024, I have embarked on an enriching internship journey as a Copywriter at Digimizu, a role I continue to fulfill to date. Within this period, I have honed my skills in crafting compelling and persuasive written content tailored to diverse audiences. Collaborating closely with the marketing team, I have contributed to the development of engaging marketing materials, including website copy, social media posts, and promotional campaigns. This internship at Digimizu has provided me with invaluable hands-on experience in the field of copywriting, allowing me to refine my writing style, creativity, and strategic communication abilities.

I worked as a Full Stack Developer at Dodol IT from July 1, 2024, to September 30, 2024. During this time, I was responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining both front-end and back-end components of web applications. I collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver scalable solutions, troubleshoot issues, and ensure high performance and user satisfaction.

I have been working part-time as a Full Stack Developer at SobatGurunTech since January 2, 2025, while pursuing my college education. My role involves developing and maintaining web applications, handling both front-end and back-end tasks, and contributing to team projects to deliver efficient and user-friendly solutions.

Education.Description: Since July 2021, I have been engaged with SMK Muhammadiyah 01 Sukoharjo, dedicating efforts to the development of software and games (PPLG). Within this environment, I actively participate in crafting innovative software solutions and designing engaging and educational games. Through collaborative teamwork, I have contributed to the creation of quality products that enrich learning experiences and add value to students and the education community at large.

I am currently a student at Universitas Sahid Surakarta, enrolled in the Informatics Engineering program under the Faculty of Science, Technology, and Health. I began my studies on October 26, 2024, and am dedicated to expanding my knowledge and skills in the field of technology and innovation.
